Title: Permits minors to be employed as a referee, umpire or official at a youth sporting event
Summary: Permits certain minors to be employed as a referee, umpire or official at a youth sporting event; limits a minor 12 or 13 years of age to one youth sporting event per week.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to permitting the employment of minors as referees, umpires or officials at youth sporting events
